column1: Local Foods////-Crunchy Chicken Sandwich for $11 had in it - nut "crumble"
column4: and pickles on a pretzel bun. This sandwich was amazing
column5: everything was so tasty from the bun to the chicken to the sauce. I liked how the pretzel bun did not get moist and chicken didn't taste dry. Also if you're one to be picky about the amount of meat served on sandwiches
column7: they give you more than enough.
